languages.text: {n}Соломон кивает.{/n} "Намного больше. И намного значимее для меня. Не смею претендовать на официальный статус, но обещаю вам свои дружбу, верность, терпение..." {n}Арбитр хмыкает.{/n} "Говорю как идиот, верно? Вы мне просто очень нравитесь, {name}. И я хотел бы выражать это чувство открыто".

{n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон кивает.{/n} "Намного больше. И намного значимее для меня. Не смею претендовать на официальный статус, но обещаю вам свои дружбу, верность, терпение..." {n}Арбитр хмыкает.{/n} "Говорю как идиот, верно? Вы мне просто очень нравитесь, {name}. И я хотел бы выражать это чувство открыто".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはうなずいた。{/n}「それ以上です。私にとってははるかに大切なものです。正式な立場を望むほど厚かましくはありません。ですが、あなたに友情と忠誠、そして忍耐を誓うことはできます…」{n}彼は自嘲気味に笑った。{/n}「馬鹿みたいに聞こえるでしょう？ただ、あなたと共にいるのが楽しいのです。その気持ちを素直に表したいだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはうなずいた。{/n}「それ以上です。私にとってははるかに大切なものです。正式な立場を望むほど厚かましくはありません。ですが、あなたに友情と忠誠、そして忍耐を誓うことはできます…」{n}彼は自嘲気味に笑った。{/n}「馬鹿みたいに聞こえるでしょう？ただ、あなたと共にいるのが楽しいのです。その気持ちを素直に表したいだけです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt.{/n} "Viel mehr. Und etwas, das mir weitaus mehr bedeutet. Ich bin nicht kühn genug, um irgendeinen offiziellen Status anzustreben, aber ich kann Euch meine Freundschaft versprechen, meine Treue, meine Geduld ..." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich rede wie ein Narr, nicht wahr? Ich bin einfach gerne mit Euch zusammen, {name}. Und ich möchte dieses Gefühl offen zeigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nickt.{/n} "Viel mehr. Und etwas, das mir weitaus mehr bedeutet. Ich bin nicht kühn genug, um irgendeinen offiziellen Status anzustreben, aber ich kann Euch meine Freundschaft versprechen, meine Treue, meine Geduld ..." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich rede wie ein Narr, nicht wahr? Ich bin einfach gerne mit Euch zusammen, {name}. Und ich möchte dieses Gefühl offen zeigen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne opine du chef.{/n} « Bien plus. Vous comptez énormément, à mes yeux. Je n'aurais pas l'audace d'aspirer à un statut officiel, mais je peux vous promettre amitié, fidélité, patience... » {n}Il s'esclaffe.{/n} « Je suis en train de me ridiculiser, n'est-ce pas ? Ce que je cherche à vous dire, c'est que j'apprécie votre compagnie, {name}. Et je tiens à exprimer ouvertement mes sentiments à votre égard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne opine du chef.{/n} « Bien plus. Vous comptez énormément, à mes yeux. Je n'aurais pas l'audace d'aspirer à un statut officiel, mais je peux vous promettre amitié, fidélité, patience... » {n}Il s'esclaffe.{/n} « Je suis en train de me ridiculiser, n'est-ce pas ? Ce que je cherche à vous dire, c'est que j'apprécie votre compagnie, {name}. Et je tiens à exprimer ouvertement mes sentiments à votre égard. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Mucho más. Y algo todavía más importante para mí. Carezco de la audacia necesaria para aspirar a un compromiso oficial, pero puedo prometerle mi amistad, mi lealtad, mi paciencia...». {n}Ríe entre dientes.{/n} «Solo digo tonterías, ¿verdad? Simplemente disfruto de su compañía, {name}. Y quisiera poder expresar ese sentimiento abiertamente».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente con la cabeza.{/n} «Mucho más. Y algo todavía más importante para mí. Carezco de la audacia necesaria para aspirar a un compromiso oficial, pero puedo prometerle mi amistad, mi lealtad, mi paciencia...». {n}Ríe entre dientes.{/n} «Solo digo tonterías, ¿verdad? Simplemente disfruto de su compañía, {name}. Y quisiera poder expresar ese sentimiento abiertamente».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“比那要重要得多，对我而言，那是最重要的事情。我并不打算厚颜无耻地渴望以此谋求官职，但我可以向你承诺我的友谊、我的忠诚、我的耐心……”{n}他苦笑了一声。{/n}“这么说话简直像个傻瓜一样，你说呢？我仅仅是喜欢和你在一起，{name}，我想坦率地表达出来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“比那要重要得多，对我而言，那是最重要的事情。我并不打算厚颜无耻地渴望以此谋求官职，但我可以向你承诺我的友谊、我的忠诚、我的耐心……”{n}他苦笑了一声。{/n}“这么说话简直像个傻瓜一样，你说呢？我仅仅是喜欢和你在一起，{name}，我想坦率地表达出来。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayli ötesine… Hem de benim nazarımda fevkalade önemli bir şeye dönüşecek. Sizden resmî bir makam arzulayacak cüretim yok ama dostluğumu, sadakatimi, sabrımı… Evet, hepsini arz edebilirim." {n}Kendi kendine gülüyor.{/n} "Budala gibi konuşuyorum, değil mi? Sadece sizinle olmaktan haz duyuyorum {name} ve bunu açıkça ifade etmek isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, {name}. And I'd like to express that feeling openly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kafasını sallar.{/n} "Hayli ötesine… Hem de benim nazarımda fevkalade ehemmiyetli bir mertebeye. Size resmî bir rütbe arzu edecek cüretim yok, lakin dostluğumu, sadakatimi, sabrımı… evet, hepsini arz edebilirim." {n}Kendi kendine güler.{/n} "Tam bir budala gibi konuşuyorum, değil mi? Sadece sizinle olmaktan haz duyuyorum {name} ve bunu açıkça ifade etmek isterim."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Much more. And something much more significant to me. I am not brazen enough to aspire to any official status, but I can promise you my friendship, my fidelity, my patience..." {n}He scoffs.{/n} "I'm talking like a fool, aren't I? I just enjoy being with you, . And I'd like to express that feeling openly."
